content.rendered:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Do you offer flower delivery services on the Gold Coast and its surrounding areas?

Yes, we provide flower delivery services on the Gold Coast and the surrounding areas, including suburbs such as Nerang, Robina, Mudgeeraba, Helensvale, Oxenford, Burleigh Heads, Surfers Paradise, and more.

Can I send flowers to the Gold Coast from outside the area?

Yes, you can send flowers to the Gold Coast within Australia or anywhere from overseas. We provide reliable delivery services to ensure your flowers arrive fresh and on time to your desired location.

Do you offer same-day flower delivery services on the Gold Coast? What are the cut-off times?

Yes, we offer same-day flower delivery services on the Gold Coast. The cut-off time is 11 am AEST, so please check our website or contact us directly for the most up-to-date information on same-day delivery options.

What types of occasions do you provide flower delivery services for, such as birthdays, anniversaries, or special events?

We provide flower delivery services for various occasions, including birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, and other special events or celebrations.

Are you a local florist on the Gold Coast specialising in floral arrangements and bouquets?

Yes, we are a local florist on the Gold Coast specialising in a wide range of floral arrangements and bouquets for various occasions, including birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, and special events.

What are some popular suburbs on the Gold Coast that you provide flower delivery to?

We provide flower delivery services to most suburbs within the Gold Coast such as Robina, Burleigh Heads, Surfers Paradise, Broadbeach, Mermaid Beach, Varsity Lakes, Hope Island, Oxenford, Ashmore, Currumbin, and more.

Can I find cheap flower delivery options for the Gold Coast on your website?

We strive to offer competitively priced flower delivery services on the Gold Coast. Prices may vary depending on the delivery location. You can contact us or visit our website to get an accurate quote for each suburb.

Do you offer free flower delivery on the Gold Coast?

We do not offer free flower delivery services on the Gold Coast. Our delivery fees are based on timed deliveries, event flower deliveries, location and distance of the delivery address. Please check our website or contact us for detailed delivery fee information.

ORDER ONLINE FOR LULLY & ROSE FLORALS

SHOP NOW
